name: Gemini Enhanced Text to Speech - Single Speaker
description: This tool leverages a two-step AI process to create natural-sounding, single-speaker audio from your text. First, it uses a language model to analyze and refine your prompt, adding stylistic instructions for tone, pace, and emotion to achieve a more expressive result. Then, in its "auto" mode, it intelligently selects the most appropriate voice from a diverse list of over 30 options, matching the voice's characteristics to the content. The final output is a high-quality .wav audio file, perfect for a wide range of applications.
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: API key for Google Gemini TTS service

model_name.description: Google Gemini TTS model name to use. Supports 'gemini-2.5-flash-preview-tts', 'gemini-2.5-pro-preview-tts'. Defaults to 2.5-flash.

voice_name.description: Default voice name to use for speech synthesis, in manual voice selection mode.
Optional voice name to be used for speech synthesis, if manual voice mode. Overrides default from config if valid

prompt.description: Raw text prompt to be processed and converted to speech. It can contain audio style instructions on top of the content to convert to speech. A text-to-speech session has a context window limit of max 32k tokens, which equals around max 22400 words.

voice_selection_mode.description: Mode of voice selection; 'manual' to use input voice or default, 'auto' to let model select the most suitable voice automatically. Default to 'auto'

chosen_voice.description: The voice name selected for the speech synthesis

file_path.description: File path where the generated WAV audio is saved

processed_prompt.description: The processed prompt for conversion to audio after style and voice control refinement
